傁字的基本解释

傁
sǒu
古同“叟”。

傁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǒu］
［《集韻》蘇后切，上厚，心。］
老人。

傁字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傁； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页112第09
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?同叟。【揚子·方言】傁艾，長老也，東齊魯衞之閒，凡尊老謂之傁。【左傳·宣十二年】趙傁在後，怒之使下。【註】傁，老稱。　又人名。春秋齊大夫公孫傁。亦作?。

傁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傁字的起名意思

暂无。

Gu Tong "senior man".
傁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǒu]
["Ji Yun" Su after the cut, thick, heart. ]
Old man.
傁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傁; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 112 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Same as the old man. [Yangtze Dialect] Lao Ai, the elder also, the leisure of the East Qi Lu and Wei, where the respected elder is called the Lao. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] Zhao Lao was behind, and the envoy of anger came. [Note] 傁, old name.　Another name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Dr. Qi Gongsun Lao. Also for?.
